item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Volkswagen plans to close at least 3 German plants and cut thousands of jobs
2. Bezos defends decision to block Washington Post’s endorsement of Harris
3. Trump campaign distances itself from controversial New York rally comments
4. [Opinion] The west underestimates North Korea at its peril
5. Spanish growth soars as Eurozone stumbles
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
